thread.title: Want to Measure Economic Climate? Watch the Chicago Barometer
thread.title_full: Want to Measure Economic Climate? Watch the Chicago Barometer - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Want to Measure Economic Climate? Watch the Chicago Barometer
text:
The Second City doesnâ€™t play second fiddle to anyone when it comes to economic indicators.
The Chicago Business Barometer, commonly known as the Chicago PMI, will be even more watched than usual on Wednesday. Economists polled by The Wall Street Journal see it dropping to 52.7 in September from 54.4 in August.
But that would be relatively good news for two reasons: First, being a so-called diffusion index, any reading above... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
